snippet.title: The Past Within - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
🦋 The Past Within is OUT NOW! 🐝

Our co-op adventure is available on:
🍎 App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1642601792
🤖 Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RustyLake.ThePastWithin
⚙️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515210/The_Past_Within/
🦐 Itchio: https://rustylake.itch.io/the-past-within

Are you ⬛#TeamPast or 🟨#TeamFuture?

The Past Within is the first co-op-only point-and-click adventure set in the mysterious world of Rusty Lake. Both players need to own a copy of the game and can play on their own preferred platform, as long as they can communicate with each other.  

Play together with someone you deem trustworthy: one in The Past, the other in The Future. Observe and communicate what you see around you. Solve the puzzles and uncover Albert Vanderboom’s plan!

Cross-platform play is possible! Both players need to own a copy of the game on their preferred device.

If you want a platform to chat with The Past or The Future, our Discord is equipped with more than enough voice chat rooms! Looking for someone to play with in The Past or The Future? Our Discord once again has you covered! Join the fun: https://discord.gg/rustylake

📰 Read the full The Past Within release post, including a big thank you to everyone that helped us during this incredible journey: https://blog.rustylake.com/the-past-within-is-out-now/

Together, let's make some memories! 🙏

Release trailer credits:
🎥 Wessel de Groot for his awesome camera work
🎞️ Studio Popova for editing this amazing trailer 
🎵 Victor Butzelaar for composing the perfect soundtrack 
🔔 Driftwood audio for the atmospheric sound effects

#ThePastWithin #rustylake
